SELECT id, project_id, code, name, logo, shop_type, commercial_type_id, sub_commercial_type_name, floor_id, floor_name, door_no, create_time, last_update, delete_flag, delete_time FROM sys_shop
ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT s1.sub_commercial_type_name , s1.code AS s_code, s1.name AS s_name, s1.logo AS s_logo, s1.shop_type AS s_shop_type , s1.commercial_type_id AS s_commercial_type_id, s1.sub_commercial_type_name AS s_sub_commercial_type_name , s1.door_no AS s_door_no, s1.floor_id AS s_floor_id, s1.floor_name AS s_floor_name , s1.create_time AS s_create_time, s1.delete_flag AS s_delete_flag, s1.last_update AS s_last_update, s1.delete_time AS s_delete_time FROM sys_shop s1 INNER JOIN sys_shop s2 ON s1.sub_commercial_type_name = s2.sub_commercial_type_name AND s1.code = s2.code
s1.delete_flag = 0 AND s2.delete_flag = 0
ORDER BY s1.create_time DESC
